name: cryptobubble
description: A React app working with [CryptoCompare API](https://www.cryptocompare.com/api/#). - fetches data about first 30 most popular cryptocurrencies - enables user to choose which ones they want to show - basic details are shown when clicked on a shown cryptocurrency - shown items can be sorted by current price - refresh button fetches the latest data - localStorage preserves cryptocurrencies chosen by the user and automatically shows them on new user session
